author: Good Enough
description:
Rikers Island, New York City’s most notorious jail complex is often described as the worst prison in the United States. With a long history of overcrowding, poor conditions, and safety concerns, Rikers has become a symbol of the challenges facing America’s correctional system. Supporters of reform argue that the facility highlights the urgent need for change, while critics say it remains a dangerous place for both inmates and staff.

#prisondocumentary #youtubeshorts #shorts #truecrimestories #darkhistory
title: The WORST Prison in the U.S. 😰💀 #didyouknow #prison #unbelievable #facts
